name: The Formatting Update
highlights: Added multiple features related to formatting.
Fixed lots of persistent bugs from previous versions.

new_features.title: Auto format button
new_features.description: Added a new button next to character names in chats. On click, automatically formats emphasis blocks (Asterisks wrappings in dialogue/narration blocks) in the message to use correct formatting.

new_features.title: Smart format hotkey
new_features.description: Added a keybind category to settings. Upon pressing the key (Default: Ctrl), will convert certain characters into other ones. Like -- into emdash.

new_features.title: Handbook
new_features.description: Added a formatting handbook on the main menu, shows all types of formatting in the app.

Bug Fixes.title: Fixed ratings/reroll buttons disappear after deleting a message.
Bug Fixes.description: Ratings/rerolls would be hidden and then due to timing inconsistencies, never get unhidden. This should be fixed.

Bug Fixes.title: Fixed scrollbar jumping up issue slightly, still occurs, but way less.
Bug Fixes.description: Scrollbar jumping has been another persistent issue, though should be way rarer now. Only happens when fully scrolled down while a message is being generated.

Bug Fixes.title: Fixed rating status carrying over to next reroll
Bug Fixes.description: Small visual bug where the previous reroll's ratings were shown on the next reroll until the reroll buttons were updated (Hovered over/interacted with).
